channel.title: Projects on Samuel Barton
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Samuel Barton

item.title: Tiny Search Engine
item.description: A search engine written in C which crawls and caches webpages, indexes html attributes of each page, and queries a search string with page ranking

item.title: Midi Controller
item.description: A MIDI controller built from scratch on FPGA written in VHDL

item.title: Yalnix
item.description: Designed and implemented userspace and kernelspace for a OS written in over 7000 lines of C

item.title: Cache Simulator
item.description: A comprehensive simulation of four different varieties of computer caches

item.title: Nuggets
item.description: Nuggets is a multi-player exploration game inspired by Rogue. The object of the game is to collect more gold nuggets than any other player. The game ends when all gold nuggets have been collected by some player. I created this game with 3 other students as our final project for COSC50.

item.title: StringerPro
item.description: A helpful native application for racquet stringers written in python
